entities.name: room 433
entities.description: A mysterious room where Myrtle is hiding. It is described as an old tiled bathroom.

entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: A student who is hiding in the toilet of Room 433. She is described as sensitive and lonely.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is talking to Myrtle. He is described as amused by Myrtle's story.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student who is curious about the boy crying in Room 433.

entities.name: the boy
entities.description: A young boy who was crying in Room 433. His identity is not revealed.

relationships.description: Myrtle is hiding in the toilet of Room 433.
Ron is talking to Myrtle about her story.
Harry is curious about the boy crying in Room 433.
Myrtle knows a secret of the boy who was crying in Room 433.
